So whatever the outcome, things look very bright for Kyle's dad. Personally, I think Kyle's dad is just a whore, taking advantage of everyone in town and...  This just in! text: Hey! Panda bear!  We don't take kindly to your types in here!

text: Now, calm down, Skeeter. He ain't hurtin' nobody.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: NO!  I wanna know som'in' from Mr. Panda Bear here! If you pandas are from mountainous areas of China and Tibet, how come you eat bamboo, which is prone to grow only in drier, more arid regions?!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Sk-heeter, I don't want no trouble nu-how.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: It's okay. I get it. There's no room in the world for pandas. Well, you don't have to worry about me! I'm off to the Island of Misfit Mascots!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Damnit, Skeeter! How come every time a panda bear come in here you gotta go flappin' your jaw?

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: The Broflovski house. Now it has massive front doors, five stories, and a water fountain just to the right of the doors. The garage itself is bigger than the house next to it. And the icicles are bigger, too. More furniture arrives

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Well? What do you think, Kyle?

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Dad? Don't you think our last new house is big enough?

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Well, this one is BIGGER!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Tomorrow's trial, Everyone vs. Everyone, is gonna make things a lot worse! We have to stop it!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Kyle, let me explain something to you.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Hoh God, here we go.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: You see, Kyle, we live in a liberal, democratic society. And Democrats make sexual harassment laws. These laws tell us what we can and can't say in the workplace. And what we can and can't do in the workplace.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Isn't that fascism?

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: No, because we don't call it fascism. Do you understand?

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Do you?

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Just look at how big this house is, Kyle. Just look at it.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: While Kyle talks to his father, Stan, Cartman and Kenny go to the bar. The three patrons are still there

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: 'Scuse me.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Yeah? What can I do for you?

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Somebody told us they saw a big panda bear in here.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Big panda bear, big panda bear, hm.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Hey! Eight-year old! We don't take kindly to your types in here!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Now, calm down, Skeeter. They ain't hurtin' nobody.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: NO!  I wanna know som'in' from Mr. I'm Eight Years Old here! How come you types are always wearin' them funny padded shirts in the winter?!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: ...Coats?

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Now, Skeeter, I don't want no trouble.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: We don't take kindly to your types around here!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Dude, what the hell is going in?!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Did you guys see a big panda bear in here, or not?

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: We don't take kindly to panda bears!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Well, we don't take kindly to you!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Well, we don't take kindly to folks that don't take kindly around here.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Kids, there was a panda bear in here. He said somethin' about the Island of Misfit Mascots.

text: Where's that?

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: If I'm not mistaken, it's over near the Jenkins place.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA

text: Whoa! Look at her!  Hey! Beautiful woman! We don't take kindly to your types around here!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Nu-how, Skeeter. She ain't hurtin' nobody.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: The courthouse, next day. Everyone vs. Everyone begins. Everyone is chattering in the audience

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: This is Case No. 47g, Everyone vs. Everyone. Representing the side of Everyone is Gerald Broflovski.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Thank you, your honor. Ladies and gentlemen of the jury, Everyone has committed a crime here, and Everyone must pay for that crime. My client, Everyone, has been hurt by this crime and must be compensated.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: The Island Of Misfit Mascots Commune. The boys reach the front gate

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: "Island Of Misfit Mascots Commune." This must be the place.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Hello there, boys.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Whoa! Who are you?

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: I'm Willy, the "Don't Stare Directly Into The Sun" Worm. Now, you boys know not to stare directly into the sun, right?

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Yes.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: That can burn your retinas and make you blind.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: ...Thanks a lot, dude.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Oink oink! Be sure to run around with scissors, says Oinky, the "Run Around With Scissors" Pig.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: I thought you weren't supposed to run around with scissors.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: That's why he's on the Island Of Misfit Mascots.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Have you seen any panda bears?

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Hm...

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Hey, kids! I'm Jimmy, the "Don't Hold On To A Large Magnet While Someone Else Uses A Fan Nearby" Falcon!

text: (You guys, come get this fucking magnet noooowwww!)  (Argh!)

text: See?

text: Oh my God! They killed Kenny!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: You bastards!  Hey! There he is!

text: Who lives in the caves 'neath the willow tree?

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: the boys rush up, and the whale and octopus leave

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Dude, are we glad to find you! You have to come back to South Park, quick!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Why?

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Because! Everyone is suing everyone else, and you're pretty much the cause of it all!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Seems all I do now is cause trouble.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Hello, kidsh, I'm Happy, the "Don't Do Stuff That Might Irritate Your Inner Ear" Badger.  Well, I'll leave now.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Please, Sexual Harassment Panda. People listen to you. You have to get them to stop suing each other.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: But, I'm just a panda.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: NO YOU'RE NOT, DUDE!! YOU'RE A GUY IN A PANDA COSTUME!!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Heeyy, I'm a real worm, pal!!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Okay, sorry, sorry.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: You're you're a worm. That's that's cool, that's cool.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Okay, yyou are a panda. But being Sexual Harassment Panda isn't helping anyone right now. You used to use your panda powers to teach people about sexual harassment. But now you need to teach a new message. A new massage that people will find useful again.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: What message?

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: That people shouldn't sue each other all the time.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: ...You know? You little cubs might just be right.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Yeah!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Okay!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: The courthouse. Closing arguments begin.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Your honor, I'd like to make my closing arguments.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Wait!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Hey, it's Sexual Harassment Panda.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: No! He's a whole new panda now, and he's got something to say.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Hello, everyone. I'm Petey, the "Don't Sue People" Panda.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: "Don't Sue People" Panda?

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Hey! We don't take kindly to folks that don't sue people 'round here!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Nuhow, Skeeter, he ain't hurtin' nobody.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Listen to me: when you sue somebody, it hurts everyone. You sue for money, but where do you think that money comes from? From the schools, from taxes, from the state. From you.  There's no such thing as free money. When you sue somebody, you take money away from parks and schools and charities, and put it in your own pocket. And that makes me a sa-a-a-a-ad panda.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: I'm a sad panda, too.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: I'm a really sad panda. I didn't know we were doing all that damage. This is all that damn lawyer's fault!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Yeah! Let's sue the lawyer!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Yeah!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: No! Don't you see? Th-the panda's right. Boy, what a great message he has! When you sue people, you just end up causing a lot of problems for society. Uhwell, I've really learned something today. All I could see was the millions of dollars coming to me and I didn't care about where the money came from. Well, I'm no longer doing sexual harassment lawsuits in schools! They're too vague and two easily corruptible. Thank you, Sexual Harassment Panda!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: "Don't Sue People" Panda.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Yeah, well, whatever, sooo let's... not... sue anyone again. Okay, come on, guys. Let's go get some ice cream!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Hooray!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Pandas love ice cream.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Well, seeing as we have no lawyers, I'm throwing the case out! Case dismissed!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Hey! We don't take too kindly to cases being dismissed around here!

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: God damnit, Skeeter, shut the hell up.

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Public Service Announcement

title: SEXUAL HARRASSMENT PANDA
text: Hello, cubs. I'm "Don't Sue People" Panda, with an important message for you! Lawsuits damage our society. I know it's tempting to make money, but just remember: that money has to come from somewhere. And usually, it ends up hurting a lot of innocent people. So, until next time, don't let frivolous sexual harassment lawsuits ruin our schools. Good-bye now.
